name: py-quast

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: Quality Assessment Tool for Genome Assemblies

dependencies.name: bedtools2
dependencies.description:
Collectively, the bedtools utilities are a swiss-army knife of tools for
a wide-range of genomics analysis tasks. The most widely-used tools
enable genome arithmetic: that is, set theory on the genome.

dependencies.name: boost
dependencies.description:
Boost provides free peer-reviewed portable C++ source libraries,
emphasizing libraries that work well with the C++ Standard Library.
Boost libraries are intended to be widely useful, and usable across a
broad spectrum of applications. The Boost license encourages both
commercial and non-commercial use.

dependencies.name: bwa
dependencies.description: Burrow-Wheeler Aligner for pairwise alignment between DNA sequences.

dependencies.name: glimmer
dependencies.description:
Glimmer is a system for finding genes in microbial DNA, especially the
genomes of bacteria, archaea, and viruses.

dependencies.name: gnuplot
dependencies.description:
Gnuplot is a portable command-line driven graphing utility for Linux,
OS/2, MS Windows, OSX, VMS, and many other platforms. The source code is
copyrighted but freely distributed (i.e., you don't have to pay for it).
It was originally created to allow scientists and students to visualize
mathematical functions and data interactively, but has grown to support
many non-interactive uses such as web scripting. It is also used as a
plotting engine by third-party applications like Octave. Gnuplot has
been supported and under active development since 1986

dependencies.name: java
dependencies.description: The free and opensource java implementation

dependencies.name: mummer
dependencies.description: MUMmer is a system for rapidly aligning entire genomes.

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-time-hires
dependencies.description: High resolution alarm, sleep, gettimeofday, interval timers

dependencies.name: py-matplotlib
dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-simplejson
dependencies.description: Simplejson is a simple, fast, extensible JSON encoder/decoder for Python

dependencies.name: python-venv
dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
